name: How to Use git clone (Step-by-Step)
description: In this video, you will learn what the git clone command is used for and how to use it. I will show you step-by-step how git clone works to copy a project from GitHub to your computer.

name: How to add new repository (Step-by-Step)
description: In this video, you will learn how to create and add a new repository on GitHub in just a few steps. Perfect for beginners!

name: How to delete repository
description: In this video, I show you step by step how to delete a repository on GitHub. Whether you're cleaning up old projects or removing test repositories.

name: Deploy Your Website to Vercel in Minutes
description: Learn how to deploy your website on Vercel step by step! In this video, I show you how to connect your project to Vercel and get it live in minutes.
